turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Bismabenzene.
turn.1: What are the different applications of Bismabenzene?
turn.2: Bismabenzene  Bismabenzene (CHBi) is the parent representative of a group of organobismuth compounds that are related to benzene with a carbon atom replaced by a bismuth atom.
turn.3: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.4: Bismabenzene itself has been synthesised but not isolated because it is too reactive.
turn.5: What do we do with the reactive compound?
turn.6: An unstable derivative with 4-alkyl substituents was reported in 1982.
turn.7: Have there been any other derivatives reported since 1982?
turn.8: A stable derivative was reported in 2016.
turn.10: This derivative has two tri(isopropyl)silyl substituents in the ortho positions and was synthesised from aluminacyclohexadiene, bismuth trichloride and DBU.
